name: multiplicatively
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to multiplication (= the process of adding a number to itself a particular number of times): The outputs of the two pathways were combined multiplicatively. All the effects are computed multiplicatively.
More examplesFewer examplesThe best interpretation of the data is that these effects combine multiplicatively. Bacteria grow multiplicatively, so the population will grow exponentially over time.There is good evidence that genes for fitness may act multiplicatively. Let A be a multiplicatively closed subset of B.
